table.name: Random Clues; Murder Evidence
table.caption: Murder Evidence
intro: The following table can be used as inspiration when a quick piece of murder-scene evidence is required.
rows: A discarded or otherwise forgotten piece of attire belonging to a suspect
Identifiable markings of magical assault using a specific spell
A letter containing incriminating information on one or more suspects
A trail of blood leading to an unconscious and badly wounded member of the group responsible
A living witness, who was unable or unwilling to leave the crime scene
outro: Ideally, this table should be consulted in advance of a situation which would require it, as the results can feed into greater plot hooks.
